metadata.title: NA passes “The Biological and Toxin Weapons Convention (Implementation) Bill, 2024”

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 22 (APP):The National Assembly on Wednesday passed a bill the Convention on the Prohibition of the Development, Production and Stockpiling of Bacteriological (Biological) and Toxin Weapons and on their Destruction, 1972 [The Biological and Toxin Weapons Convention (Implementation) Bill, 2024]. "The Biological and Toxin Weapons Convention (Implementation) Bill, 2024," the legislation was introduced by Dr. Shezra Mansab Ali Khan Kharal.
